item.title: Credits
item.description: Icons: teamwork by Aneeque Ahmed from the Noun Project international by Laymik from the Noun Project

item.title: The Project
item.description: Project Inception The SONAR project is co-funded by swissuniversities in the framework of the P-5 “Scientific Information” Program. The project has been submitted in February 2018 and accepted in June 2018. An abridged version of the project application document is available here. Facts Duration: November 2018 – October 2020 (24 months) Total cost (incl. own funding): 997’800 CHF Main building block: Digital Library RERO DOC Software platform: Invenio 3 Goals Science showcase “collect, promote and preserve scholarly publications by authors affiliated with Swiss public research institutions”
